caption: This is a pop/soft rock music piece. There is a female vocalist singing melodically in the lead. The keyboard is playing the main tune while the bass guitar plays in the background. The rhythm is being provided by an acoustic drum beat. The atmosphere is lighthearted. The piece has a slow tempo. The song is in major key. This piece could be used in the soundtrack of a romantic comedy movie, especially during the scenes where the characters are reminiscing about the good old days.
